item.title: DJ Snake - Let Me Love You (Feat.Justin Bieber)
item.description:
I used
to believe
We were burnin’
on the edge
Of somethin’ beautiful
somethin’ beautiful
Sellin’
a dream
Smoke and mirrors
keep us
Waiting on a miracle
on a miracle
Say go through
the darkest of days
Heaven’s
a heartbreak away
Never let you go
never let me down
Oh it’s been a hell
of a ride
Driving
the edge of a knife
Never let you go
never let me down
Don’t you give up
nah nah nah
I won’t give up
nah nah nah
Let me love you
let me love you
Don’t you give up
nah nah nah
I won’t give up
nah nah nah
Let me love you
let me love you
Oh baby
baby

Don’t fall
asleep
At the wheel
we’ve got a million
Miles ahead of us
miles ahead of us
All
that we need
Is a rude awakening
to know
We’re good enough
know we’re good enough
